## MapboxMapProps.pinColor property

The color that default map markers should be, in the form of a HEX color code. By default, the standard Mapbox pin color is used, which is light blue (\#3FB1CE). This prop should not be used with [PinComponent](./search-ui-react.mapboxmapprops.pincomponent.md) or with [renderPin](./search-ui-react.mapboxmapprops.renderpin.md)<!-- -->. If either are provided, pinColor will be ignored.

**Signature:**

```typescript
pinColor?: string;
```
